title: Audit Treasury Operations
description: An auditor reviews the treasury department's controls over cash management and investments.

tasks.description: Review the company's investment policy to understand the types of investments that are permitted.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor understands the rules for investing company cash.

tasks.description: Obtain a list of all current investments and verify they are compliant with the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms all investments are of the permitted type and credit rating.

tasks.description: Test the controls over wire transfers, verifying that all large transfers require dual approval from two different managers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor tests a sample of wire transfers and confirms all had the required dual approvals.
